title: Peloton shares plunge 26% on weak holiday quarter, sluggish demand for splashy new products
summary_full: Peloton's product overhaul was designed to bring in new customers and encourage existing members to trade up. Instead, shoppers turned away from higher prices.
summary_public: Peloton's product overhaul was designed to bring in new customers and encourage existing members to trade up. Instead, shoppers turned away from higher prices.
